definition: registered letter

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
roar/cry/CL:個|个[ge4]
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter, I guess she has.
sentences.chinese: 我媽給我發了一封掛號信，我想她有的事情要說。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

sentences.english: My mother has sent me a registered letter.
sentences.chinese: 我媽給我發了一封掛號信。

sentences.english: I'd like to send a letter by registered mall.
All right, I'll have it registered, then.
Please send your application by registered mail.
sentences.chinese: 請把你的申請寄掛號信。

sentences.english: Do you wish to send it as an ordinary or registered letter ?
sentences.chinese: 你想寄一封平信還是掛號信？

sentences.english: A certified letter, with a faraway postmark.
sentences.chinese: 是一封掛號信，上面蓋着的是一個遙遠的地方的郵戳。

sentences.english: Either in person or by registered post as appropriate to the licensing offices concerned.
sentences.chinese: 親身或用掛號信寄交適當的牌照事務處。

sentences.english: I'd like to register this letter.
sentences.chinese: 李女士到郵局寄掛號信。

sentences.english: A man called at a village post-office for a registered letter.
sentences.chinese: 一個人來到鄉村郵局取掛號信。

sentences.english: B: OK, that’s 29 cents for the stamp and $2.00 to send it by registered mail.
Whenever he has registered letters for us, he will ring the doorbell.
sentences.chinese: 如果有掛號信要送給我們，他就會在門口按一下鈴。

sentences.english: B: I'd like to send a letter by Registered Mail.
I want to send this letter by register.

to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
to put together an order of goods
to drown sb in a wicker basket, a form of 沉潭[chen2 tan2]
foolish talk/nonsense
a device used to check money and detect counterfeit bills
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
